lifePeriods.location: New York City, New York, United States
events: stopped creating art for four years due to financial problems

lifePeriods.location: New York City, New York, United States
events: met photographer and art dealer Alfred Stieglitz
began spending summers painting in New Mexico
continued to live and paint in New Mexico after Stieglitz's death
lost her central vision and began to work in charcoal and pottery
